CN.content:

Paragraph: The devices were completed by evaporating LiF / Al as the cathode.

| --- |

Explanation: In the given paragraph, "LiF / Al" is the only material mentioned. It is specified as the cathode material used in the devices. Therefore, the Material Name entity is "LiF / Al".

| LiF / Al |

The other terms, such as "devices" and "cathode," are not materials, so they are not included in the table.
